name: The Exception (VoltaikVIP)
description:
Controls:

WASD - move

Left click - shoot

Right click - swap

This is the game I made for the brackeys 2021.2 Gamejam! It is about trying to defeat an out of control robot called the exception. It is called that because robots are supposed to follow exact instructions but this type of robot is out of control.

Music: The Chonker.mp3 by Defrini

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
